statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT transaction_id, client_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_description, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT client_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE client_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND client_id = 300;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_records;
SELECT transaction_id, client_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE currency_code = 'USD';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency_code FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT report_id, client_id, performance_score FROM performance_reports WHERE risk_score > 7 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT client_id, total_assets FROM performance_reports WHERE total_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE currency_code = 'USD' AND amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT client_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance_score FROM performance_reports GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY avg_performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount <= 500 AND client_id = 5;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id, client_name FROM clients JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY client_id;

SELECT clients.client_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM clients JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id GROUP BY clients.client_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM client_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT client_id, performance_score FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM client_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM client_information INNER JOIN client_accounts ON client_information.client_id = client_accounts.client_id WHERE client_accounts.balance > 5000 ORDER BY client_accounts.balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionRecords ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM TransactionRecords WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientInformation ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, performance_score, performance_details FROM PerformanceReports WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM AccountSummary WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionRecords ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT account_id, client_id, account_balance, account_type FROM AccountSummary WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT username, created_date FROM AdminUsers ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT report_id, client_id, report_date, performance_score FROM PerformanceReports WHERE performance_score >= 4.0 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
